verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, when Natan <S%H5416><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto him, after he had gone in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Bat-Sheva <S%H1339><s%>. Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon me, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, according to thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>: according unto the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of thy tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> blot out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my transgressions <S%H6588><s%>.
Wash <S%H3526><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me throughly <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8685><s%> from mine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and cleanse <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me from my sin <S%H2403><s%>.
For I acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: and my sin <S%H2403><s%> is ever <S%H8548><s%> before me.

Against thee, thee only, have I sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this evil <S%H7451><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>: that thou mightest be justified <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8799><s%> when thou speakest <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and be clear <S%H2135><s%> <S%H8799><s%> when thou judgest <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
Behold, I was shapen <S%H2342><s%> <S%H8797><s%> in iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; and in sin <S%H2399><s%> did my mother <S%H517><s%> conceive <S%H3179><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.

Behold, thou desirest <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> truth <S%H571><s%> in the inward parts <S%H2910><s%>: and in the hidden <S%H5640><s%> <S%H8803><s%> part thou shalt make me to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.

Purge <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me with hyssop <S%H231><s%>, and I shall be clean <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: wash <S%H3526><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me, and I shall be whiter <S%H3835><s%> <S%H8686><s%> than snow <S%H7950><s%>.

Make me to hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness <S%H8057><s%>; that the bones <S%H6106><s%> which thou hast broken <S%H1794><s%> <S%H8765><s%> may rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Hide <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> from my sins <S%H2399><s%>, and blot out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8798><s%> all mine iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.

Create <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in me a clean <S%H2889><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; and renew <S%H2318><s%> <S%H8761><s%> a right <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me.
Cast me not away <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from thy presence <S%H6440><s%>; and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not thy holy <S%H6944><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> from me.
Restore <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto me the joy <S%H8342><s%> of thy salvation <S%H3468><s%>; and uphold <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me with thy free <S%H5081><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%>.
Then will I teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8762><s%> transgressors <S%H6586><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thy ways <S%H1870><s%>; and sinners <S%H2400><s%> shall be converted <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee.

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me from bloodguiltiness <S%H1818><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, thou 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of my salvation <S%H8668><s%>: and my tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall sing aloud <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
O YY <S%H136><s%>, open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou my lips <S%H8193><s%>; and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall shew forth <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy praise <S%H8416><s%>.

For thou desirest <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>; else would I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it: thou delightest <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not in burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>.

The sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> are a broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8737><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%>: a broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8737><s%> and a contrite <S%H1794><s%> <S%H8737><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, thou wilt not despise <S%H959><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Do good <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8685><s%> in thy good pleasure <S%H7522><s%> unto TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>: build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

Then shalt thou be pleased <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, with burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and whole <S%H3632><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>: then shall they offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> upon thine altar <S%H4196><s%>.
